name: Chronicon
description: Use the magical device known as the Chronicon to travel into the souls and memories of fallen heroes to re-live their grand tales! Epic adventures full of loot and monsters await!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows  7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Dual Core, 2.4 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9.0c and Shader Model 3.0 Compatible Dedicated Video Card, 512 MB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 500 MB available space Additional Notes: Intel HD video cards poorly supported. Requirements may change during development.
